data.title: Rentrak Average Salaries
data.meta_description: What is the average salary of a Rentrak employee per year? Explore company details, Job salaries, nearby and related companies.
data.text:
View salary at Rentrak by Job Title BETA

The average salary of Rentrak jobs will vary depending on the location, industry, category, and department. The table below shows the job titles you might be interested in and the salary range of different positions at Rentrak. A difference in pay for the same job title may be based on a number of factors, such as experience, training, level of education, skills and competencies, and so on. FT Corporate Recruiter (2210) jobs at Rentrak earn the most with an average annual salary of $232,744, while Maintenance Worker jobs earn the least with an average annual salary of $36,764.

The estimate average salary for Rentrak employees is around $89,569 per year, or the hourly rate of Rentrak rate is $43. The highest earners in the top 75th percentile are paid over $101,533. Individual salaries will vary depending on the job, department, and location, as well as the employeeâ€™s level of education, certifications, and additional skills.
